results.description: Serie A's bottom side Sampdoria name former Chelsea and Leicester City boss Claudio Ranieri as their manager.
results.title: Claudio Ranieri: Sampdoria appoint former Chelsea & Leicester manager

results.description: Alexis Sanchez scores and is sent off on his first Inter Milan start but his side maintain their 100% winning run in Serie A by beating Sampdoria.
results.shortTitle: Sanchez scores and sent off in Inter win
results.title: Sampdoria 1-3 Inter Milan: Alexis Sanchez scores and is sent off

results.description: Leicester City complete the signing of Belgium midfielder Dennis Praet from Sampdoria for a reported £18m
results.title: Dennis Praet: Leicester City sign Sampdoria midfielder

results.description: Radja Nainggolan scores the winner as Inter Milan beat Sampdoria to consolidate third place in Serie A.
results.title: Inter 2-1 Sampdoria: Radja Nainggolan scores winner

results.description: Napoli's hopes of securing a first Serie A title since 1990 suffer a blow with a goalless draw at AC Milan.
results.shortTitle: Napoli title hopes hit by Milan draw
results.title: AC Milan 0-0 Napoli: Visitors' Serie A title hopes hit

results.description: VAR plays a major role, including ruling out an injury-time equaliser, as Juventus beat Sampdoria to maintain their unbeaten run in Serie A.
results.shortTitle: VAR controversy as Juve beat Sampdoria
results.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Juventus striker scores twice in win over Sampdoria

results.description: Juventus host Sampdoria at Allianz Stadium in Serie A - follow live text commentary, social media and analysis.
results.shortTitle: VAR rules out late Sampdoria equaliser against Juventus
results.title: Serie A: Juventus v Sampdoria

results.description: August's Genoa bridge collapse shocked a country. As the city's teams met on Sunday, there were tributes, reflections and tales of survival against the odds.
results.shortTitle: 'My car flew down, I was resigned to death'
results.title: Genoa bridge collapse: Derby unites a city struck by 'momentous disaster'

thumbnail.altText: Davide Capello's car in the rubble of the Morandi Bridge

results.description: Marcelo Brozovic scores a 94th-minute winner to earn Inter Milan victory at Sampdoria in a match which sees three goals ruled out by the Video Assistant Referee (VAR).
results.title: Sampdoria 0-1 Inter Milan

thumbnail.altText: Inter Milan players celebrate scoring against Sampdoria

results.description: Fabio Quagliarella scores a sensational goal as Sampdoria inflict a first defeat on Carlo Ancelotti as manager of Napoli.
results.shortTitle: Napoli suffer first loss under Ancelotti
results.title: Sampdoria 3-0 Napoli: Visitors suffer first defeat under Carlo Ancelotti

results.description: Sampdoria take inspiration from Juventus by unveiling the signing of Ronaldo - but this one's arriving from Leeds United.
results.title: Sampdoria announce Ronaldo... Vieira not Cristiano

results.description: Follow live text commentary as Barcelona visit Levante - plus updates as Juventus go for the point they need to win the title at Roma.
results.shortTitle: Barcelona lose 5-4 to Levante - plus Juventus win Serie A
results.title: European football: Levante v Barcelona, with updates from Roma v Juventus and Sampdoria v Napoli

thumbnail.altText: Barcelona players react to going one goal down

results.description: Juventus go six points clear at the top of Serie A as they bounce back from their Champions League exit with victory over Sampdoria.
results.title: Juventus 3-0 Sampdoria

results.description: Striker Edin Dzeko, who has been linked with a move to Chelsea, plays as Roma's torrid form continues with a home defeat to Sampdoria.
results.title: Roma 0-1 Sampdoria

results.description: Serie A bottom club Benevento, who had only one point from their first 18 games, make it two wins in a row by beating 10-man Sampdoria.
results.title: Benevento 3-2 Sampdoria

results.description: Marek Hamsik breaks Diego Maradona's all-time scoring record for Napoli as they beat Sampdoria to remain top of Serie A.
results.title: Napoli 3-2 Sampdoria

results.description: Gianluigi Buffon is left on the Juventus bench in their defeat by Sampdoria because he "needs time to get over" Italy's World Cup exit.
results.title: Sampdoria 3-2 Juventus

results.description: Duvan Zapata takes advantage of a huge error from his cousin Cristian Zapata as Sampdoria beat AC Milan in Serie A.
results.title: Sampdoria 2-0 AC Milan

results.description: Sampdoria's home game against Roma on Saturday is postponed because of the threat of heavy rain and thunderstorms in Genoa.
results.title: Serie A: Sampdoria's game with Roma postponed

results.description: Everton-linked Gylfi Sigurdsson is left out of Swansea's side once again as they brush Sampdoria aside in their final pre-season friendly.
results.title: Swansea City 4-0 Sampdoria
